description: Configures DNS lookup on Windows hosts

adapter_names.description: Adapter name or list of adapter names for which to manage DNS settings ('*' is supported as a wildcard value). The adapter name used is the connection caption in the Network Control Panel or via C(Get-NetAdapter), eg C(Local Area Connection).

ipv4_addresses.description: Single or ordered list of DNS server IPv4 addresses to configure for lookup. An empty list will configure the adapter to use the DHCP-assigned values on connections where DHCP is enabled, or disable DNS lookup on statically-configured connections.
